data.text:
@CDPHE Letter to Anonymous:

https://t.co/l6gS9Asu2b

Add me, I'm real and need to see clear. 

#Anonymous
.
.
.
.
Maslow will not be proved wrong in the eyes of history the way that will will be if we do not adequately address the crises that face all of our people together.

@CDPHE This means our labs were paying attention and testing properly, which is great. Now we have to continue to do that so that we know what's going on. Everyone should be masking and distancing in public spaces to help avoid as much of the next wave as possible.
@CDPHE Why is "2 Years of COVID-19" something to celebrate? Total BS. @CDPHE has been total BS.
